meanings.definition: Relating to body movement or gestures as a form of communication.
meanings.sent1: Her kinesic expressions showed her excitement through her dance moves.
meanings.sent2: The kinesic signals he used while speaking helped convey his message effectively.
meanings.sent3: The kinesic dance of the scarecrow in the field amused the children passing by.
meanings.sent4: His kinesic language was like a silent poetry that spoke volumes to those who understood.
meanings.sent5: The kinesic performance on stage left a lasting impression on the audience.
